original_title: やわ乳太夫 月夜の恋わずらい
overview: An Eros story about a man who fell in love with a high-class whore and the family surrounding him on the storyteller of Gidayu, who plays the role of Shunputei Deneda. The eldest son of a savvy family, Tateo, falls in love with Takao, a beautiful woman he meets by chance. But she was a top-notch whore who didn't know the way.
title: Yawa chichi tayû: Tsukiyo no koiwazurai
